channel.title: Az 900 on Azure 4 Everyone
channel.description: Adam Marczak blog created for purpose of personal contribution and sharing knowledge to communities everywhere.

item.title: AZ-900 Episode 10 | Networking Services | Virtual Network, VPN Gateway, CDN, Load Balancer, App GW
item.description:
• Describe products available for Networking such as
    • Virtual Network,
    • Load Balancer,
    • VPN Gateway,
    • Application Gateway and
    • Content Delivery Network

item.title: AZ-900 Episode 9 | Compute Services | Vms, VM Scale Set, App Service, Functions, ACI, AKS
item.description:
• Describe products available for Compute such as
    • Virtual Machines,
    • Virtual Machine Scale Sets,
    • App Services, Functions,
    • Azure Container Instances (ACI) and
    • Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)

item.title: AZ-900 Episode 8 | Resources, Resource Groups & Resource Manager
item.description:
• Describe Resources
  • Describe Resource Groups
  • Describe Resource Manager
  • Describe the benefits and usage of core Azure architectural components

item.title: AZ-900 Episode 7 | Geographies, Regions & Availability Zones | Microsoft Azure Fundamentals Course
item.description:
• Describe Data Centers
  • Describe Regions & Region Pairs
  • Describe Geographies
  • Describe Availability Zones
  • Describe the benefits and usage of core Azure architectural components

item.title: AZ-900 Episode 6 | Public, Private & Hybrid cloud deployment models
item.description:
• Describe Public cloud
  • Describe Private cloud
  • Describe Hybrid cloud
  • Compare and contrast the three different cloud models

item.title: AZ-900 Episode 5 | IaaS vs PaaS vs SaaS cloud service models
item.description:
• Describe Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS)
  • Describe Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS)
  • Describe Software-as-a-Service (SaaS)
  • Compare and contrast the three different service types

item.title: AZ-900 Episode 3 | CapEx vs OpEx and their differences
item.description: • Describe the principles of economies of scale

item.title: AZ-900 Episode 2 | Principle of economies of scale
item.description: • Describe the differences between Capital Expenditure (CapEx) and Operational Expenditure (OpEx)

item.title: AZ-900 Episode 1 | Cloud Computing and Vocabulary
item.description:
• Describe what is Cloud Computing
  • Describe terms such as High Availability, Scalability, Elasticity, Agility, Fault Tolerance, and Disaster Recovery

item.title: AZ-900 | Course Overview
item.description: Azure Fundamentals certification is an opportunity to prove knowledge of cloud concepts, core Azure services, Azure pricing, SLA, and lifecycle, and the fundamentals of cloud security, privacy, compliance, and trust.
